## **Comparing the scores per condition**

#### **Original paper graph:**
![Scores per condition of the original paper](C:/Users/Sanne/Dropbox/MasterProject/Modelling/ScoresPerCondition.png){width=60%}

#### **Rescorla-Wagner model prediction:**
On the left, the average weights for each food group per condition. This average is taken over all trials and all participants. However only the 16 trials in which the food was asked. <br />
```{r, echo = FALSE}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
par(las=1)
A <- c((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"])
B <- c((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"])
X <- c((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"], (aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"])
emptyPlot(c(-5,105),c(-0.02,0.05), xmark = c(0,50,100), bty='n', main = "Weights to Diamond", xlab = "Condition", ylab = "Probability")
points(c(0, 50, 100),A, pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(0, 50, 100),B, pch =16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(0, 50, 100),X, pch =15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(0.05,0,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))

A <- c((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"])
B <- c((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"])
X <- c((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"], (aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"])
emptyPlot(c(-5,105),c(-0.02,0.05), xmark = c(0,50,100), bty='n', main = "Weights to NoDiamond", xlab = "Condition", ylab = "Probability")
points(c(0, 50, 100),A, pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(0, 50, 100),B, pch =16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(0, 50, 100),X, pch =15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(0.05,0,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))

A<- c(((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "A"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "A"])))
B<- c(((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "B"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "B"])))
X<- c(((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome000" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome050" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"])), ((aggAllTrain$x)[aggAllTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllTrain$Group.2 == "X"] - ((aggAllNotTrain$x)[aggAllNotTrain$Group.1 == "Outcome100" & aggAllNotTrain$Group.2 == "X"])))
emptyPlot(c(-5,105),c(-0.07,0.09), xmark = c(0,50,100), bty='n', main = "Rescorla-Wagner", xlab = "Condition", ylab = "Probability")
points(c(0, 50, 100),A, pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(0, 50, 100),B, pch =16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(0, 50, 100),X, pch =15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(0.05,-0.02,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))

emptyPlot(c(-5,105),c(0,8), xmark = c(0,50,100), ymark=c(0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8), bty='n', main = "Experiment Data", xlab = "Condition", ylab = "Causal rating score")
A <- c(4.3,5.7,7.6)
B <- c(2.7, 1.1, 0.2)
X <- c(3.2,3,1.6)
points(c(0, 50, 100),A, pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(0, 50, 100),B, pch =16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(0, 50, 100),X, pch =15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(0.05,8,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))



```

## **Comparing scores over trials for each condition seperately**

### **Condition 0.00**
A was either Strawberry or Walnut. <br />
B either Peanut or Peach. <br />
X either Shrimp or Wheat.<br />

#### **Original paper graph:** 

![Scores over all 16 trials (plus a pre measure), condition 0.00)](C:/Users/Sanne/Dropbox/MasterProject/Modelling/ScoresPerDay000.png){width=60%}

Note that the pre measure was not taken with the models (since that would just be 0 for all of them). This is also not done in any of the other conditions.

#### **Rescorla-Wagner model prediction:**

```{r,echo = FALSE}
par(las=1)
par(mfrow = c(1,2))

emptyPlot(c(1,16),c(-0.01,0.08), xmark = c(1,4,8,12,16), bty='n', main= "Cond000, weights to Diamond", ylab = "Weight", xlab = "Trial")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "A"], pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "B"], pch = 16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "X"], pch = 15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(1,0.06,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))

emptyPlot(c(1,16),c(-0.01,0.08), xmark = c(1,4,8,12,16), bty='n', main= "Cond000, weights to NoDiamond", ylab = "Weight", xlab = "Trial")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "A"], pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "B"], pch = 16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "X"], pch = 15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(1,0.06,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))


emptyPlot(c(1,16),c(-0.02,0.04), xmark = c(1,4,8,12,16), bty='n', main= "Rescorla wagner", ylab = "Weight", xlab = "Trial")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond - Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "A"], pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond - Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "B"], pch = 16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(1:16), (Cond000$Diamond - Cond000$NoDiamond)[Cond000$FoodGroup == "X"], pch = 15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(1,0.04,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))

emptyPlot(c(0,16),c(0,8), xmark = c(1,4,8,12,16), ymark=c(0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8), bty='n', main = "Experiment Data", xlab = "Trial", ylab = "Causal rating score")
A <- c(4.9, 5, 5.1, 3.2, 2.8, 2.4, 2.2, 4.5, 4, 3, 2.2, 3.4, 4.7, 2.8, 2.6, 4.3, 4.1)
B <- c(3.8, 1.9, 1.5, 3.9, 3.7, 3.8, 4.7, 2.9, 2.7, 4.5, 4.3, 2.8, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5, 3, 2.4)
X <- c(4.5, 5, 2.1, 4.9, 2.7, 2.4, 4.3, 4.9, 3.3, 4.9, 3, 2.8, 4.8,2.8, 4.8, 5.1, 3.1)
points(c(0:16),A, pch = 0, type = "b")
points(c(0:16),B, pch =16, type = "b", lty = 2)
points(c(0:16),X, pch =15, type = "b", lty = 4)
legend(0.05,8,legend =c("A", "B", "X"), pch = c(0,16,15))
```

### RW

```{r, echo = FALSE}
listY <- list()
FirstRun <- data.frame(Cues = Cues2, Outcomes = Outcome050, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
train.FR <- createTrainingData(FirstRun, random = F)
wm.FR <- EDLearning(train.FR, progress = F, etaNeg = FALSE)
listX <- list()
for(i in 1:16){
  df <- as.data.frame(getWM(wm.FR,i))
  df$Trial <- i
  listX<-list.append(listX, df)
}
#listY<- listX
listY <- bind_rows(listX)

SecondRun <- data.frame(Cues = Cues1, Outcomes = Outcome000, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
train.SR <- createTrainingData(SecondRun, random = F)
wm.SR <- EDLearning(train.SR, progress = F, etaNeg = FALSE, wm = wm.FR[[16]])
listX <- list()
for(i in 1:16){
  df <- as.data.frame(getWM(wm.SR,i))
  df$Trial <- i+16
  listX<-list.append(listX, df)
}
listZ<- bind_rows(listX)
listY<- rbind(listY, listZ)

ThirdRun <- data.frame(Cues = Cues3, Outcomes = Outcome100, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
train.TR <- createTrainingData(ThirdRun, random = F)
wm.TR <- EDLearning(train.TR, progress = F, etaNeg = FALSE, wm = wm.SR[[16]])
listX <- list()
for(i in 1:16){
  df <- as.data.frame(getWM(wm.TR,i))
  df$Trial <- i+32
  listX<-list.append(listX, df)
}
listA<- bind_rows(listX)
listY<- rbind(listY, listA)


word <- c(Cues[1], Cues[2], Cues[3], Cues[4], Cues[5], Cues[6], Cues[7], Cues[8], Cues[9], "env")
exactWord <- c(Cues[1], Cues[2], Cues[3], Cues[4], Cues[5], Cues[6], Cues[7], Cues[8], Cues[9], "env")
exactWords <- data.frame(Word = word, exactWord = exactWord, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

names(getexactwords) <- exactWords$Word
listY$Word <- NA
for(i in 1:nrow(listY)){
  listY[i,]$Word <- getexactwords[gsub("...[0-9]+", "",row.names(listY[i,]))]

}
```

```{r}
wm.TR <- EDLearning(train.TR, progress = F, etaNeg = TRUE, wm = wm.SR[[16]])
listX <- list()
for(i in 1:16){
  df <- as.data.frame(getWM(wm.TR,i))
  df$Trial <- i+32
  listX<-list.append(listX, df)
}
listA<- bind_rows(listX)
listY2<- rbind(listY2, listA)
listY2$Fossil <- NA

FirstTestRun <- data.frame(Cues = CuesTP1, Outcomes = Outcomes1, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
train.FTR <- createTrainingData(FirstTestRun, random = F)
wm.FTR <- EDLearning(train.FTR, progress = F, etaNeg = F, wm = wm.TR[[16]])
listX <- list()
 for(i in 1:10){
   df <- as.data.frame(getWM(wm.FTR,i))
   df$Trial <- i+48
   listX <- list.append(listX, df)
 }
 listB <- bind_rows(listX)
 listY2 <- rbind(listY2, listB)


listY2$Word <- NA
for(i in 1:nrow(listY2)){
  listY2[i,]$Word <- getexactwords[gsub("...[0-9]+", "",row.names(listY2[i,]))]

}
```
